model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
You job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Parent, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes" or "No"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker B: No, I used to go to them all the time.  This will be my first one in a while and probably my last since my wife and I are about to have our baby.

MEMORY:
1. Speaker B's wife is pregnant, so they are considering attending a local festival for just a day.
2. Speaker A and Speaker B discuss the logistics of attending a festival with a small baby.
3. Speaker B is feeling a bit jealous of Speaker A's ability to go out and enjoy live music while they are at home with the pregnancy.
4. Speaker B is not going out drinking much due to their wife's pregnancy.
5. Speaker A and Speaker B enjoy bluegrass music.
6. Speaker B's wife is pregnant and has three more months to go until the due date.
current_dialogue: Speaker B: No, I used to go to them all the time.  This will be my first one in a while and probably my last since my wife and I are about to have our baby.

raw_prediction: That's understandable. It'll be a different kind of experience attending festivals with a little one on the way. Enjoy this one while you can!
